title: Please Riot, don't buff Neeko
body:
As someone who's been playing a crap ton of Neeko, I must say, she does not need a buff. 
She's already got massive nuking potential, tons of burst damage and a good kit. 
Any more buffs and she'll be gutted the patch after her buff.

replies.body:
Her winrate is utter shit everywhere but bad V, all the way up to challenger.

Not quite Azir/Ryze tier shit, but close. Considering she is not hard to play compared to either of them, it is a sign of being really underpowered.

Id say she still has a mid-tier skill cap, which is why her win rate isn't soaring right now.
Plus, winrate doesn't always correspond with how op a champ is. After all, league is a five person game, and neeko is fairly new. I expect the winrate to climb a bit once we get more Neeko players.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=dbW1Palr,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-01-21T04:36:38.662+0000)
>
> Her winrate is utter shit everywhere but bad V, all the way up to challenger.
> 
> Not quite Azir/Ryze tier shit, but close. Considering she is not hard to play compared to either of them, it is a sign of being really underpowered.

She did just get released and I don't know why people go off champions win rate there are ALOT of variables in there that need to be considered to see a champions true win rate. I think Neeko is fine right now.
